document_data.mainbody:
Indra Lucere was a merchants daughter in Luskan during the late 15 century DR. 
Some time around 1490 DR, Indra found her father Bertrand murdered in their hall. Soon after, her fianc√© Edwin went missing, too. Luckily, two days later, she encountered the Champion of the Burning Dawn, and, relaying her fear that Edwin had been abducted or worse, she enlisted the help of the Champion.
